summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.6°C) and outside temperature (down 6.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13192 lux) and cloud levels (up 639 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14881 lux) and cloud levels (up 1589 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 638.8m lower than yesterday, 582.8m lower than the past week, 1588.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1085.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1668.3m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and light levels will be low during the day. Changeable conditions.
